meanings.definition: Not concealed or hidden; exposed to view
meanings.sent1: The discovert treasure chest gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The discovert garden was filled with colorful flowers.
meanings.sent3: The discovert surprise party made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her discovert talent shone brightly on stage.
meanings.sent5: The discovert mountain peak stood majestically against the sky.

meanings.sent1: She discovert the hidden passage behind the bookshelf.
meanings.sent2: The detective discovert the truth about the case.
meanings.sent3: The magician discovert the rabbit in his hat.
meanings.sent4: The sunrise discovert the beauty of the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The scientist discovert a new species of plant in the jungle.

meanings.sent1: The announcement discovert the date of the event.
meanings.sent2: The documentary discovert the history of the ancient civilization.
meanings.sent3: The teacher discovert the answer to the difficult question.
meanings.sent4: The artist discovert her emotions through her paintings.
meanings.sent5: The explorer discovert a hidden cave deep in the forest.
